PassiveTracerFlows.TracerAdvDiff.set_c! — Method.
set_c!(prob, c)
set_c!(prob, c::Function)

Set the solution sol as the transform of c and update variables v on the grid g.

PassiveTracerFlows.TracerAdvDiff.updatevars! — Method.
updatevars!(prob)

Update the vars in v on the grid g with the solution in sol.
